name: Bubblegum UPPERCUT!
description:
Ludum Dare 34: Growing/Two-Button Controls

You are bubblegum. That rose has a lot of eyes and is growing very quickly. Keep up with it! Defeat enemies with your SUPER UPPERCUT OF VICTORY!

Left and right arrow keys to move

Double tap a direction to slide

Press both at once to UPPERCUT!

Don't forget to vote and comment on the Ludum Dare page!

Music by Gregg Wright
